City Secretary
==============

City Secretary's Office
-----------------------

The City Secretary is an officer of the City of Magnolia. The position of City Secretary is a statutory position required by State law and the City Charter. This office oversees the preparation of the agendas and minutes for the
[Magnolia City Council](https://www.cityofmagnolia.com/mayor-and-city-council)
, and all Council-appointed boards, commissions, and committees.

* Prepares all agendas and minutes for the Magnolia City Council, and the minutes of the Planning & Zoning Commission and other Council-appointed boards, commissions, and committees.
* Prepares proclamations for the Mayor.
* Serves as Records Management Officer for the City of Magnolia.
* Contracts with Montgomery County Elections for all City elections.
* Certifies TABC applications and issues City alcohol permits for establishments inside the city limits of Magnolia.

If you need to view or request copies of public information
, you must complete a
and submit it to the attention of Christian Gable City Secretary using any of these methods:
